_meanings:
Ardent or intense desire,
eagerness; (this word, like the
word {#lawaBa#} <ab>q. v.</ab>, is used only by
later writers like Kalhaṇa, 
Bilhaṇa, and is probably derived from
Persian or Arabic); {#asminnAsIttadanu#}
{#niviqASlezahevAkalIlAvelladvAhukvaRitavalayA#}
{#saMtataM rAjalakzmIH#} <ls>Vikr. 18. 101</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab>
{#hevAkin#} below.
